name: Heroes Of The Offworld Arena
description: Take part in the space war and clear out the space station.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and newer Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Memory: 2048 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTS 450 or AMD Radeon HD 6750 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 800 MB available space
